3. He never called. Good thing I realized that something is wrong with him, and called anot...

Good thing I realized that something is wrong with him, and called another plumber
If you prefer not to become the one - AVOID problematic servicemen.
I live here but he was just a bit rude.
I can understand all the reasons for not being able make an appointment, but 3 in a row with times that the company suggested themselves is very disappointing.
(Also he never mentioned anything about a free quote and all that fake stuff he said in his response.) He just got caught trying to take me a sucker but i reviewed him
Update: after my bad review, the owner calls me 3 times like a psycho and I don't answer and I block his number
Didn't think I would need a restraining order after looking for a PLUMBER
desires: They were not able to do the work but recommended Someone who was able to
Definitely an expert professional And got to Dorchester quickly
He was knowledgeable, efficient, and the price was very very reasonable
Tony came out for an emergency fix of a sink and drain issuein one of my apartments, and both my tenant and I were really happy with how quickly he resolved the issue
Highly recommend--I'll definitely call them again.
He is responsive, friendly and does great work
Today he really shocked me in the best possible way
praise_quotes: Great experience! Nate was awesome.
Horvitz has taken care of our plumbing issues for a number of years, and we've always been happy with their work.
Nate and Mike were great, courtesy and professional! They were able to assess the issue with our heating system, recommend a solution and complete...
We needed service during the holiday weekend.
The Horvitz team were prompt, super thorough (ran into a snag and came back to ensure things were done perfectly), and competitively priced.
Dishwasher installation.
Had Horvitz do my annual hvac and fireplace turn up and they were professional, quick and great! Highly recommend Nate & John.
I had an issue with a condensation pump Nate came diagnosed the problem immediately and made sure it was in good working order very pleasant and...
We had an issue with the laundry faucet spraying unevenly.
Our water heater installation went smoother than expected.
We had a weak stream of hot water in the bathroom sink, but strong pressure everywhere else.
My plumber previously recommended updating old piping, so I finally called this service for copper repipe work.
The kitchen drain kept bubbling every time I washed dishes, so I reached out to Boston Plumbing Service.
A weird sulfur smell started coming from one of the sinks, so I reached out for support.
My water heater installation needed adjustments after years of shifting.
The faucet leak in the kitchen had me worried, but their crew repaired it quickly and thoroughly.
The team showed up quickly and got my leaking pipe fixed without any hassle.
Steve came and taught me everything I need to know about the plumbing in my new condo.
I appreciated how they laid out all the options and didn’t push me toward the priciest fix.
Excellent service, quality results, and fair pricing—one of the best plumbing experiences I’ve ever had.
They were not able to do the work but recommended Someone who was able to.  We will use them in the future.
Anthony has helped us with multiple issues over the past year. He is responsive, friendly and does great work. Would highly recommend hiring him.

Woke up to a leak and needed someone to come in quickly. I was able to get in touch with Anthony who had a busy day and was able to fit me in between appointments. He's professional, knowledgeable, an

We needed an estimate on a heater and water heater replacement and Dave was fast, efficient, and responsive.  He gives competitive estimates and also follows up after to see how things are going.  Tha
Had good communication with  District   Plumbing  on doing a job  on our house . very genuine person  I can see why they are a Five star rating on yelp ...... thank you for the follow up call ..... d
complaint_quotes: did not complete job had to call someone else to do job correctly charged 425 dollars for a simple job

Left a message yesterday with no reply so I called again this morning.  Did not get the name of the person that answered.  I explained that I needed a new water heater.  I told him I live in Back Bay.

No call, No show.

Had a scheduled appointment but no show and no call with an explanation or offer to reschedule.

They came to my house, looked at everything, seemed like they wanted the work. I asked every day for two weeks for the quote and never received it. Seems to be a disconnect between the guys and the of
